channel.title: [508 tut] How to make it were any level can pvp any level[tut]

item.title: [508 tut] How to make it were any level can pvp any level[tut]
item.dc:creator: @figment12 figment12
item.description:
@figment12 wrote:

diff 1/10

Open up

PlayerCombat.java

search for this:

else if(p.combatLevel == p2.combatLevel

You will see this.

[code]} else if(p.combatLevel == p2.combatLevel) {
return true;
}
return false;
}[/cpde]
Replace that with this.

} else if(p.combatLevel == p2.combatLevel) { return true; } return true; }

It should let any lvl attack any lvl in pvp castle wars and duel or any other fighting

[/code]

Read full topic
item.source: [508 tut] How to make it were any level can pvp any level[tut]
